citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
In the feed room, there were several expired medications. Multiple medications were expired for greater than 5 years.
There were expired Albon (expired 1/2017), Bactricillin (expired 12/2022), Ivomec (expired 5/2021), compounded
metronidazole (expired 5/2022), Albon (expired 4/2019), Metronidazole (12/2019), Baytril injectable (2/2015), and
Gentavet spray (11/2018) on hand. Medications must be administered within date to provide the appropriate response
and to protect the animals from disease. Facility must ensure medications administered are not expired.
Facility disposed of all expired medication during the inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
In the feed room, there were several expired medications. Multiple medications were expired for greater than 5 years. 
There were expired Albon (expired 1/2017), Bactricillin (expired 12/2022), Ivomec (expired 5/2021), compounded 
metronidazole (expired 5/2022), Albon (expired 4/2019), Metronidazole (12/2019), Baytril injectable (2/2015), and 
Gentavet spray (11/2018) on hand. Medications must be administered within date to provide the appropriate response 
and to protect the animals from disease. Facility must ensure medications administered are not expired. 
Facility disposed of all expired medication during the inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
End Section
